title: New UPSC Batch Starting Soon
description: Our new comprehensive UPSC preparation batch starts from January 15, 2024. Limited seats available. Early bird discounts until December 30.

title: Congratulations to Our UPSC 2023 Successful Candidates
description: Proud to announce that 42 of our students have cleared the UPSC Civil Services Examination 2023, with 5 in the top 100 ranks.

title: Special Seminar: Cracking the MPSC Mains
description: Join us for a special one-day seminar on effective strategies for the MPSC Mains examination, conducted by Mrs. Varsha Patil.

title: Scholarship Test for Defense Services Courses
description: Announcing a scholarship test for aspiring defense services candidates. Top performers will receive up to 50% scholarship on course fees.

title: New Study Material for Police Services Exams Released
description: We have released updated study materials for Police Services examinations, incorporating the latest pattern changes and focusing on the new syllabus.

title: Weekend Batch for Working Professionals
description: Introducing weekend batch for working professionals preparing for UPSC and MPSC examinations. Classes will be held on Saturdays and Sundays.

title: Free Webinar on Career in Civil Services
description: Join our free webinar on 'Building a Career in Civil Services' conducted by Dr. Rajesh Sharma, featuring insights from recent UPSC toppers.

title: MPSC 2023 Results: 35 Selections from Our Academy
description: Congratulations to our 35 students who have successfully cleared the MPSC State Services Examination 2023, including 3 in the top 10 ranks.
